title: Richard Jefferson
description:
Zach and ESPN's Richard Jefferson discuss the start of the season: under-the-radar feel-good stories, the Bucks defense, struggles in Brooklyn, Philly and Los Angeles, the Warriors' repeat chances, much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
